Title: Disabling Recording of an Activity (span) in .NET OpenTelemetry Instrumentation - Steve Gordon - Code with Steve
Description: In this post, I share a solution to programmatically disable the recording (exporting) of an Activity when instrumenting code for OpenTelemetry.

Title: Ratchets in software development
Description:
So there's a thing we use at work which I call a ratchet.
In our codebase, there are "patterns" which we used to use all the time, but we decided to stop using them, but removing all of the existing instances at once is too much work. We want to remove all of these instances eve...

Description: Open-Source Grammarly Alternative. Contribute to zlwaterfield/scramble development by creating an account on GitHub.

Title: Warning: macOS Sequoia 15 may bypass DNS encryption

Title: Announcing Swift 6
Description: We’re delighted to announce the general availability of Swift 6. This is a major new release that expands Swift to more platforms and domains.
